description: Analyzes AI-search visibility across platforms (ChatGPT, Perplexity, Gemini, Claude) and Google shopping ecosystem health (Maps, Reviews, Business Profile, Merchant Center) with automation-first recommendations

steps: string

findings: Limited structured data found for products
Natural language product descriptions not optimized
Product data difficult for agentic parsing

key_issues: Product schema is incomplete or missing essential attributes
Weak brand/entity recognition across AI search platforms
Natural language descriptions are not optimized for AI parsing

issues: Address and categories not fully optimized
Business photos are outdated or missing
Attributes and posts not actively managed
Product data has missing or inconsistent attributes

recommendations.title: Implement Comprehensive Structured Product Schema
recommendations.description: Adopt full product schema markup, ensuring all required and recommended fields are present for every product, including price, description, reviews, and brand attributes.
recommendations.expected_impact: Improves discoverability and parsing accuracy on all AI search platforms.

recommendations.title: Enhance Brand Entity and Natural Language Optimization
recommendations.description: Audit and rewrite product and brand descriptions to use clear, unambiguous language optimized for AI understanding, and ensure brand mentions are consistent.
recommendations.expected_impact: Boosts brand/entity recognition and increases likelihood of agentic shopping recommendations.

recommendations.title: Automate Feed Validation and Attribute Enrichment
recommendations.description: Set up automated feed checkers and enrichment tools to fill gaps in product data, quickly fix errors, and resolve disapprovals.
recommendations.expected_impact: Directly increases Google Merchant Center score and product eligibility.

recommendations.title: Update and Optimize Google Maps Listing
recommendations.description: Add high-quality current photos, review all business categories, and ensure address and attributes are 100% accurate.
recommendations.expected_impact: Improves local visibility and customer trust.

recommendations.title: Initiate Review Generation and Response Workflow
recommendations.description: Encourage recent customers to leave reviews and set up an automated response template to boost engagement and rating freshness.
recommendations.expected_impact: Boosts review volume, recency, and sentiment signals for Google ranking.

steps: Audit current website/product pages for missing or incomplete schema
Map all product attributes and match to required schema.org fields
Apply or update structured data using automated plugins/scripts
Validate implementation using Google Rich Results Test and Schema Markup Validator
manual_steps: Map product attributes to schema.org fields

steps: Connect inventory/PoS system to Merchant Center if possible
Run automated feed validation and error reporting
Enrich missing attributes using scripts or third-party tools
Resolve any feed disapprovals and resubmit
Review business information for accuracy
Upload current high-resolution photos
Update categories and business attributes
Request verification if required

automation_opportunities.task: Implement and maintain structured product schema across catalog
automation_opportunities.action: Use plugins, automated scripts, or feed-based schema generators to handle markup at scale

automation_opportunities.task: Automated feed validation and enrichment for Merchant Center
automation_opportunities.action: Apply feed optimization tools or scripts for ongoing validation and attribute completion

automation_opportunities.task: Automate review solicitation and response management
automation_opportunities.action: Integrate email/sms automation for review requests and response templates

automation_opportunities.task: Google Maps photo and category updates
automation_opportunities.action: Manual review and upload required for visual and categorical accuracy
